content.rendered:
Throughout Access, the theme of “recalculating”—led by Lindsey Pollak’s keynote session—was prevalent. This year taught career educators to embrace new beginnings, new systems, and new practices that will propel the industry forward. We hope that the sessions provided inspiration and insights that you can take back to campus this fall.

Watch the session recordings in the Access On-Demand Recording Hub.

View Access sessions on-demand

excerpt.rendered: Watch the sessions from Access 2021 in the On-Demand Recording Hub
